channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: When Myths Become Media ‘Facts’
item.description: What excuse is there today for anyone not to double-check?

item.title: Farewell, MTG (for Now)
item.description: For all the talk of splits within MAGA, President Trump still has the power to vaporize entrenched Republican members of Congress.

item.title: Israel Must Be Self-Sufficient, for Its Own Sake
item.description: U.S. taxpayer-funded assistance to Israel has become a cudgel.

item.title: Dennis Prager’s Unbreakable Spirit
item.description: His survival after a terrible accident one year ago is a summons — to continue defending faith, moral clarity, and the American value system.

item.title: Classroom Indoctrination Is Alive and Well, Unfortunately
item.description: The ‘radical indoctrination’ that Trump supposedly banned persists.

item.title: NYC Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani keeps Trump 'fascist' label after White House meeting
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is standing by his description of President Trump as a "fascist," even after a face-to-face meeting at the Wh...

item.title: ICE holds record 65,000 migrants; arrests, deportations reach record pace
item.description: ICE is shattering records for immigration enforcement, setting new high-water marks for arrests, deportations and detention.

item.title: From loyalist to dissenter: Marjorie Taylor Greene's exit raises questions about MAGA's future
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene's abrupt resignation from Congress after her falling out with President Trump is exposing divisions within the MAGA moveme...

item.title: Trump says Chicago residents begging for crime help after violent weekend
item.description: President Trump says Chicagoans are clamoring for federal law enforcement assistance with after two weekend shootings left one teen dead and several o...

item.title: JFK's granddaughter reveals terminal cancer diagnosis, criticizes cousin RFK Jr.
item.description: John F. Kennedy's granddaughter disclosed Saturday that she has terminal cancer, writing in an essay in "The New Yorker" that one of her doctors said ...

item.title: Documents: Letitia James Lied To Bank, Insurer In Alleged Mortgage Fraud Scheme
item.description: The timeline of James' claims suggest she knew her claims were false when she made them.

item.title: Here’s Why Gavin Newsom’s Race-Based Gerrymandering In CA Will Fail
item.description: 'It’s pretty blatant that they were using race when they drew up new districts to get rid of Republicans,' said Hans von Spakovsky.

item.title: Exclusive: Lawsuit Claims Leftist Benson Is Breaking Michigan Election Law
item.description: Secretary of State Jocelyn Benson's lax residency directive is 'unconstitutional and unlawful,' the RNC lawsuit alleges.

item.title: The Left Is Nowhere Near Letting Go Of Its Trans Obsession
item.description: The left's approach to defending transgenderism may fluctuate, but its loyalty is unshakeable.

item.title: The Media’s Latest Push To Sink Comey Indictment Was Entirely Based On A Lie
item.description: 'Any assertion that the grand jury 'never voted on the two-count indictment' is contradicted by the official transcript,' a DOJ filing states.
